title: Nailtopia Bio-Sourced, Chip Free Nail Lacquer - All Natural, Strengthening Biotin and Superfood-Infused Polish - Chip Resistant Formula - Quick-Dry, Long Lasting Wear - Champagne Dreams - 0.41 oz
features: FOR LONGER, STRONGER NAILS: Bless your nails with a healing, moisturizing manicure treatment; Nailtopia’s collection of ultra-hydrating, quick drying, pigmented color formulas helps strengthen and promote growth for thin, damaged nails

A SUPERFOOD BLEND IN EVERY COAT: Formulated with a proprietary complex of real fruits and vegetables, each coat of Nailtopia polish delivers a blend of Calcium, Vitamins B5 and A, Biotin, and natural plant proteins to care for thin, cracked nails

THE PERFECT, CHIP FREE MANI: Paint on a salon quality shade at home; Nailtopia’s insta dry, quick-hardening nail lacquer colors are sure to lock your manicure or pedicure in place for days, without any chipping, fading pigments, or cracks

HONESTLY CLEAN AND GREEN: Treat your nails and cuticles right, while still treating the Earth with care; All of Nailtopia’s sustainable formulas are non-toxic, 100% Vegan, and Leaping Bunny approved, and each nail lacquer formula is 85% Bio-Sourced

THE NAILTOPIAN EFFECT: Finally, a one-stop-shop for all your nail care needs; Shop the friendliest nail brand, with super superfood-infused lacquer and cuticle treatments that keep hands and nails healthy, strong, and freshly manicured
description: Honestly clean, green, and bio-sourced! Nailtopia’s nail and cuticle care products are always eco-friendly, formulated with plant-based, bio-sourced, renewable ingredients, and designed with clean manufacturing practices. Unlike most nail brands, Nailtopia’s sustainable formulates are made with plant-based bio-sourced fruit & vegetables. Our biotechnology is a greener process that considerably reduces environmental footprint. Most nail lacquers are 10% bio-sourced while Nailtopia nail lacquer is 85% bio-sourced. Vegetable based ingredients like potato, corn, wheat and manioc partially replace conventional petrochemical solvents, plasticizer and nitrocellulose - which means Nailtopia lacquer is more breathable and much healthier for your nails. And of course, all Nailtopia colors and nail care products are All Free, Non-Toxic, 100% Vegan, and Leaping Bunny approved!
